solution_line_template: First we need to know what half of Bills toys are, {bill_toys} toys / {half_divisor} = <<{bill_toys}/{half_divisor}={half_bill_toys}>>{half_bill_toys} toys.
Together the boys have {bill_toys} toys + {hash_toys} toys = <<{bill_toys}+{hash_toys}={total_toys}>>{total_toys} toys.
